REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0557 reute r f BC-INDONESIAN-INFLATION 04-08 0046

TEXT.TITLE: INDONESIAN INFLATION RATE 8.8 PCT IN 1986/87
TEXT.BODY: Inflation was by 8.8 pct in Indonesia during fiscal 1986/87 to March 31, compared to 5.66 pct the previous year, Information Minister Harmoko said after a cabinet session to discuss the economic situation. REUTER
